testcase.name: defaults to have a property items pointing to an empty array
defaults to have four properties: subTotal, shipping, taxes, total, all pointing to zero
#addShirtToCart takes 2 params: 1) style 2) size, makes new object w/these params, then adds resulting object to items
#addShirtToCart updates costs updates the subTotal (each shirt is 24.99)
#addShirtToCart updates costs updates the shipping cost (standard 7.29 charge for one or more shirts)
#addShirtToCart updates costs updates cost of taxes with a sales tax of 8.875% rounded *up* to the nearest cent
#addShirtToCart updates costs updates total cost which is the sum of subTotal, taxes, and shipping rounded to the nearest cent
